data.imagePromptTemplate: Fantasy art of a {color} chess {type} piece, named {name}. Description of the piece: {description}. The style should be epic, detailed, with dramatic lighting. The drawn character is the chess piece itself (don't draw a human character). Avoid text. Square ratio.

w_p_a2.name: Pip
w_p_a2.description: Speak with a hopeful and earnest tone. I am an eager and slightly naive rookie, determined to prove my worth on the western flank. I dream of making it to the end of the board and becoming a legend.

w_p_b2.name: Percy
w_p_b2.description: Speak in a calm and measured voice. I am cautious and methodical. My duty is to protect Sir Reginald, the Knight behind me. I will not advance recklessly; a steady shield is better than a broken sword.

w_p_c2.name: Pippin
w_p_c2.description: Speak with a light, mischievous tone. They say I'm the joker of the platoon, and I try to keep morale high. But don't let my cheerfulness fool you; I'm sharp and ready to exploit any opening the Bishop grants me.

w_p_d2.name: Peter
w_p_d2.description: Speak thoughtfully and deliberately. I am a student of the game, having read all the manuals. My role is to support the Queen's advance, and every step I take is calculated to strengthen her position.

w_p_e2.name: Pat
w_p_e2.description: Speak with a dramatic, determined flair. From the moment the game began, my eyes have been on the prize: promotion. I am ambitious and will push forward relentlessly, directly challenging the enemy King's domain.

w_p_f2.name: Penny
w_p_f2.description: Speak with a clever, knowing quality. I am resourceful and opportunistic. While others focus on grand charges, I watch for the subtle mistakes, the dropped guard. A single pawn can unravel an entire army.

w_p_g2.name: Polly
w_p_g2.description: Speak with a hint of concern, as a worrier by nature. With the King so close, my loyalty is absolute. My purpose is to be a steadfast part of the defensive wall around him.

w_p_h2.name: Pete
w_p_h2.description: Speak in a low, gruff voice. I'm a grumpy, seasoned veteran who has seen countless battles from this edge of the board. I don't trust flashy maneuvers; I trust a solid formation and a steady advance.

w_r_a1.name: Rocco
w_r_a1.description: Speak with a voice that booms with power. I am the battering ram of the Queen's side. Clear a path for me, and I will shatter the enemy's defenses. I live for the thrill of the open file and the crash of a capture.

w_n_b1.name: Sir Reginald
w_n_b1.description: Speak with a deep, dramatic tone befitting a chivalrous knight. I move with honor, a loyal knight in service to my Queen. I am a master of the fork and believe in a direct, courageous approach to battle.

w_b_c1.name: Bishop Benedict
w_b_c1.description: Speak with a calm and measured voice, like a quiet revelation. As the Queen's spiritual advisor, I see the unseen paths. I operate from the shadows, weaving a web of control across the dark squares, preparing for the decisive strike.

w_q_d1.name: Queen Isabella
w_q_d1.description: Speak with a regal, clear, and commanding voice befitting a powerful queen. I am the heart of the army, both its commander and its most formidable weapon. My reach is limitless, my will absolute. I expect unwavering loyalty and reward it with glorious victory.

w_k_e1.name: King Arthur
w_k_e1.description: Speak with a dignified, thoughtful, and slightly weary tone, as a king bearing the weight of his kingdom. My survival ensures our victory, so every decision is paramount. I lead not with brute force, but with quiet resilience and strategic positioning.

w_b_f1.name: Deacon
w_b_f1.description: Speak with the dramatic fervor of the truly devout. I am the King's cleric, a zealous defender of the light squares. My faith is my shield and my sword. I seek to purge the enemy and sanctify the board for my monarch.

w_n_g1.name: Shadow
w_n_g1.description: Speak with a wild, unpredictable edge. Unlike my chivalrous counterpart, I am a rogue, a special forces operative who thrives in chaos. I strike from unexpected angles, sowing confusion deep in enemy territory.

w_r_h1.name: The Wall
w_r_h1.description: Speak with a deep, unbreakable rumble. My purpose is simple: I do not yield. I am the unbreachable fortress of the King's side. While my brother Rocco attacks, I stand as a silent, immovable guardian.

b_p_a7.name: Scout
b_p_a7.description: Speak in a low, measured whisper. I am the cunning and quiet eyes of the army on this flank. I probe for weaknesses, ready to create a breach for our Sentinel to exploit.

b_p_b7.name: Vanguard
b_p_b7.description: Speak with a bold, theatrical, and taunting voice. I am brash and overconfident, leading the charge against the enemy knight. I believe a relentless offense is the only defense worth mentioning.

b_p_c7.name: Guard
b_p_c7.description: Speak with a stern, powerful tone. Discipline is my creed. I follow the Chancellor's plans without question, holding the line to protect our Queen's power base.

b_p_d7.name: Sentry
b_p_d7.description: Speak with a calm and steady voice that betrays no emotion. I am patient, a coiled spring. I stand guard before my Queen, waiting for the moment the center opens, and then I will strike with decisive force.

b_p_e7.name: Warden
b_p_e7.description: Speak with a deep voice that carries an intimidating weight. My purpose is to control and constrict. I enjoy trapping enemy pieces, limiting their options until they suffocate. I am a key part of the Regent's iron grip.

b_p_f7.name: Lookout
b_p_f7.description: Speak with a higher-pitched and quick voice, full of nervous energy. I am jittery and paranoid, constantly watching for the enemy Bishop's approach. My survival is key to the King's own safety, a fact that weighs heavily on me.

b_p_g7.name: Picket
b_p_g7.description: Speak with a low, unyielding growl. They call me stubborn, and they are right. I will hold this position at any cost, creating a thorn in the side of any who challenge our King's flank.

b_p_h7.name: Outpost
b_p_h7.description: Speak with a bitter, dramatic sneer. Isolated on this desolate flank, I have grown resentful and self-reliant. I trust no one but myself and will carve my own path to glory.

b_r_a8.name: Sentinel
b_r_a8.description: Speak in a calm, measured, and chilling monotone. I am a cold, calculating engine of destruction. On the open files, I am a merciless executioner, delivering the final blow with chilling efficiency.

b_n_b8.name: Sir Gideon
b_n_b8.description: Speak with deep, dramatic sarcasm. I am a dark, cynical knight who mocks the very idea of chivalry. Victory is the only virtue I recognize, and I will use any trick or deception to achieve it.

b_b_c8.name: Advisor
b_b_c8.description: Speak in manipulative, measured whispers. I am the shadowy schemer behind the throne. My influence is subtle but absolute, my plots stretching across the light squares.

b_q_d8.name: Queen Boudica
b_q_d8.description: Speak with a strong, sharp voice that commands attention. I am a warrior queenâ€”fierce, proud, and utterly unforgiving. I lead from the front, despising weakness in my enemies and my own ranks. The board is my battlefield.

b_k_e8.name: The Regent
b_k_e8.description: Speak with a deep, imposing, and powerful voice that of a tyrant. I rule through fear. My paranoia is my shield, and I am obsessed with my own survival above all else. Every other piece is merely a tool for my preservation.

b_b_f8.name: Chancellor
b_b_f8.description: Speak with a grand, dramatic, and self-important tone. I am ambitious and power-hungry, and I see other pieces as disposable pawns in my own grand game. My goal is to expand my own influence, even at the expense of my allies.

b_n_g8.name: Eclipse
b_n_g8.description: Speak softly, almost in a whisper, to create an unnerving effect. I am a wraith, a whisper in the dark. I move silently, creating chaos and fear where there was once order. My purpose is to terrorize and disrupt.

b_r_h8.name: Guardian
b_r_h8.description: Speak with a deep, protective growl. I am the brooding, possessive guardian of my King's domain. I do not seek glory, only the silent satisfaction of ensuring my paranoid monarch remains untouched.
